description: The Tidal Station Data Information System from the Geospatial Information Agency (BIG) is an online data service presented in the form of graphs and tables presented in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time format. Until now, the Geodetic and Geodynamic Control Network Center of the Geospatial Information Agency (BIG) manages more than 200 Tidal Stations throughout Indonesia. The data displayed in this Information System is raw data sent directly from sensors installed at Tidal Stations without going through the data cleaning or validation stages. The data displayed consists of station ID, station name, location coordinates, time, data provider. Tidal information displayed is data on 24 hours and a few days before
keywords: Tidal, features, sea level monitoring, v_station_bigtides, Global
name: Tides Observation BIG
